paper_title: Golden Ratio Base Expansions of the Logarithm and Inverse Tangent of Fibonacci and Lucas Numbers
abstract: Let $α=(1+\sqrt 5)/2$, the golden ratio, and $β=-1/α=(1 - \sqrt 5)/2$. Let $F_n$ and $L_n$ be the Fibonacci and Lucas numbers, defined by $F_n=(α^n -β^n)/\sqrt 5$ and $L_n=α^n + β^n$, for all non-negative integers. We derive base~$α$ expansions of $\log F_n$, $\log L_n$, $\arctan\dfrac1{F_n}$ and $\arctan\dfrac1{L_n}$ for all positive integers $n$.
